Action.Name: DlgGroupBox.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a group box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the group box control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgGroupBox.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a group box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the group box control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the group box control properties indexed by "Enabled", "Text", "Visible".
